data.title: RuPaul Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about RuPaul on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature RuPaul including RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars, RuPaul's Drag Race, and more.
data.text:
Sabrina's Choice

After her aunts decide to go their separate ways, Sabrina has to choose which of the two should raise her.

Put to the Test

Tia and Tamera take the S.A.T exams, and later when the results come back the twins get test scores; Lisa tries to sell some of her at a boutique store, but she is snubbed by the owner.

The Incident

A hairstylistâs (guest star RuPaul) gossip revives a dormant family feud between Alex (Elisha Cuthbert) and Jane (Eliza Coupe). As Dave (Zachery Knighton) looks for a new recipe to jumpstart his flagging sandwich business, his food truck is stolen.

Valerie Makes a Pilot

While shooting footage for a reality TV pilot she hopes will get picked up by Bravo, Valerie Cherish learns that her nemesis Paulie G. is creating a series for HBO about a sitcom writer and his relationship with a neurotic older actress--a redhead named 'Mallory Church.' After dropping in on Andy Cohen's lunch at the Chateau Marmont, an incensed Valerie crashes the HBO offices to get them to cease and desist.
